profile.body: I'm a web developer with almost a decade of experience building SEO-friendly websites and responsive user interfaces. I specialize in using HTML, JavaScript, CSS, SCSS, and CSS in JS. I'm well-versed in modern CSS best practices, including grid, flexbox, and theme architecture using CSS variables. Additionally, I have extensive experience with server-side API design and consumption on a JAMstack architecture using full-stack web frameworks such as Next.js and Sveltekit. I've also built maintainable packages and processes in SalesForce Apex (Java). In terms of design, I have extensive experience in web and user interface design, and consistently achieve pixel-perfect design implementations. My approach to work is guided by the principle of delivering value. Whenever I begin a task, I ask myself: how can I bring more value to the company and its clients? This mindset encourages me to think creatively and motivates me to go above and beyond in my work.

records.description: Built websites that obtained and secured top search rankings on Google for over 3 years in the #1 most competitive chiropractic market in the world. Built automated customer journeys and attribution reporting by synchronizing marketing automation, CRM, analytics, and EHR technology implementations. Results yielded a 30% increase in cash profits leading to acquisition.

Leveraged brand style guides to design and build landing pages and company websites using HTML, CSS, and JQuery. Drove internal improvements to MarTech stack amid political and financial resistance. Researched and developed personas that fueled messaging. Built and deployed automated campaigns that generated leads in the roofer segment for the first time in the company's history. Wore the hat of SalesForce admin/developer and built systems using Apex that drove internal adoption of the SalesForce platform. Implemented customer journeys and marketing automation.

Designed and built JAMstack websites leveraging Figma, headless content management, REST and GraphQL APIs, and component-driven javascript web frameworks like Next JS and Sveltkit. Implemented automated customer journeys and campaigns in marketing automation web applications. Built custom components that seamlessly integrate websites with MarTech stack using Google, Zoho, and SalesForce APIs. Built custom SalesForce functionality using Apex and the SalesForce Developer Platform. Consulted marketing leaders on MarTech stacks. Built and maintained marketing attribution dashboards that tracked customers through every stage of the funnel up to initial sale.
